pages.text: The Laser Wrench is primarily used to connect multiple Blocks together.$(br2)$(l:laserio:laser_node)Nodes$(/l) and $(l:laserio:laser_connector)Connectors$(/l) can be connected by Shift-RightClicking to select a block, and then right clicking another block to form a connecion.$(br2)The max connection range is 8 blocks.
